attributes.action: Free summer of love for the youth of the country in 2021
attributes.additional_details:
We know these are very hard times for young people ,with them having no work , being restrained from living a free life and being ordered not to socialize with their friends . 
They should be allowed one full summer to be able to let off steam to regain trust and to let them know we know how they feel . 
The music industry is taking a big hit and the youth are not being given a chance to release all the inner frustrations . ONE FULL SUMMER OF LOVE NEXT YEAR
attributes.background: We would like the Government to allow the youth of the UK to have a summer of love and be allowed to hold free parties with in reason across the UK next summer as a thank you for abiding to the lockdown rules

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
